title: Murder under Cover
description: When she receives an exquisite copy of the 'Kama Sutra' from her best friend, Robin, to appraise and restore, Brooklyn Wainwright anticipates recreating a beautiful book and spicing up her love life. But before Brooklyn can get started, Robin winds up in big trouble; her apartment is ransacked, and the great guy she recently met lies murdered in her bed. Now Robin is the number-one suspect. Luckily Brooklyn's boyfriend, British security expert Derek Stone, has moved to San Francisco and is ready to help ...
author: Kate Carlisle
